title: Wolf Be Mine!  A Wolves Habitat
description: Rubbing her arm, I felt a strange roughness on her skin and whipped the covers back.Teeth imprints.Sam had been bitten. Stirring at my touch, I looked up to find dark green eyes with golden flecks staring back at me.Cevin made it through the first turning and Sam is home safe. The problem? She's been bitten and Sam may become a wolf. As 'wolfy' things keep arising, they are more than convinced that on the next full moon Sam will be joining their pack. Alejandro knows there's more than meets the eye and has another idea about Sam's future, keeping a watchful eye.Will she be wolf, or something more?
author: B.K. Walker
